<Link id="l00214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="214"><Highlight kind="comment">/// mergeAliasSetsForMemoryLocation - Given a memory location, merge all alias</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="215"><Highlight kind="comment">/// sets that may alias it. Return the unified set, or nullptr if no aliasing</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="216"><Highlight kind="comment">/// set was found. A known existing alias set for the pointer value of the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="217"><Highlight kind="comment">/// memory location can be passed in (or nullptr if not available). MustAliasAll</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="218"><Highlight kind="comment">/// is updated to true/false if the memory location is found to MustAlias all</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="219"><Highlight kind="comment">/// the sets it merged.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="220"><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/aliasset">AliasSet</a> &#42;AliasSetTracker::mergeAliasSetsForMemoryLocation(</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="222"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/aliasset">AliasSet</a> &#42;FoundSet = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
